def_cn: (动物)长膘，变肥;催肥，养肥
def_en: If an animal is fattened, or if it fattens, it becomes fatter as a result of eating more.

def_cn: 使(企业)发财;使(利润)增长;为…牟利
def_en: If you say that someone is fattening something such as a business or its profits, you mean that they are increasing the value of the business or its profits, in a way that you disapprove of.
